channel.title: Help with quest save for espeon 508
channel.description:
can you help me i added monkey madness quest and made it so when you kill the jungle demon you are able to wear d scim and i have p.questpoints = 1 in my equipment on d scim but everytime you logg out you gota redo it cause when you try and wield d scim it sends messege agian saying you must complete monkey madness any help?
im using espeon source someone plz help >.<

item.title: Help with quest save for espeon 508
item.dc:creator: @elemenation_2 elemenation 2
item.description:
@elemenation_2 wrote:

i dont know much about on 508s but on my old server u had to add a extra spot in the player save aka mainsave on 508s also i dont know how complicated this is on a 508 cause of the dat file… anyway hope this helps

Read full topic
